forecast.wind: Northwest 3 to 4, occasionally 5, backing west by midday, increasing 4 to 5 by mid-afternoon, perhaps locally 6 after dusk.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight, increasing slight to moderate mid-afternoon, perhaps locally rather rough in the far west for a time before dawn.
forecast.weather: Showers and a risk of mist patches at first occasional showers from this afternoon, locally heavy with a risk of thunder.
forecast.visibility: Good, locally moderate to poor at times.
